plugins/adr-manager/skills/adr-managemen.summary: {"purpose": "Provides CLI for creating, listing, viewing, and searching Architecture Decision Records (ADRs) using a template and auto-incrementing IDs.", "layer": "Plugin / ADR-Manager", "usage": ["python3 adr_manager.py create \"Title\" --context \"...\" --decision \"...\"", "python3 adr_manager.py list [--limit N]", "python3 adr_manager.py get N", "python3 adr_manager.py search \"query\""], "args": ["create: title, --context, --decision, --consequences, --alternatives, --status", "list: --limit", "get: number", "search: query"], "inputs": ["templates/adr-template.md", "next_number.py", "ADRs/ directory"], "outputs": ["ADRs/NNNN-<slug>.md", "Terminal output"], "dependencies": ["next_number.py"], "key_functions": ["create_adr", "list_adrs", "get_adr", "search_adrs"], "consumed_by": ["Developer CLI"]}

{"purpose": "Sequential Identifier Generator that scans artifact directories (Specs, Tasks, ADRs, Chronicles, BRs, BWs) to find the next available sequence number and prevent ID collisions.", "layer": "Investigate / Utils", "supported_object_types": ["spec", "task", "adr", "br", "bw"], "usage": ["python plugins/adr-manager/scripts/next_number.py --type spec", "python plugins/adr-manager/scripts/next_number.py --type all", "python plugins/adr-manager/scripts/next_number.py --dir legacy-system/business-rules --pattern \"BR-(\\d{3})\""], "args": ["--type / -t: artifact type (spec, task, adr, br, bw, all)", "--dir / -d: ad-hoc directory scan", "--pattern: regex for --dir", "--recursive: scan subdirs", "--json: JSON output"], "inputs": ["kitty-specs/", "tasks/", "ADRs/", "legacy-system/business-rules/", "legacy-system/business-workflows/"], "outputs": ["Next available ID string (e.g. '0045') to stdout"], "dependencies": [], "consumed_by": ["Manual workflow execution", "scripts/domain_cli.py (indirect)"], "key_functions": ["find_max_number(): finds highest existing integer for a type", "get_next_number(): fills ID gaps by finding first unused integer", "find_max_in_directory(): ad-hoc scan with custom regex", "show_all(): prints next ID for all artifact types"]}

plugins/agent-loops/hooks/closure-guard..summary: {"purpose": "Stop-hook that blocks premature agent session exit when a learning loop is active by checking for an active loop state file and emitting a JSON 'block' decision if closure has not been completed.", "layer": "Agent Hooks / Lifecycle", "supported_object_types": ["Claude Stop Hook", "Agent Loop State"], "usage": ["Registered as a Stop hook in Claude hooks.json; executed automatically by Claude on session exit"], "args": ["stdin: hook input JSON (Claude stop hook protocol)"], "inputs": [".claude/agent-loop-state.local.md (frontmatter: iteration, max_iterations, closure_done, pattern)"], "outputs": ["JSON decision block: {decision: 'block'/'allow', reason, systemMessage}"], "dependencies": ["jq", "sed", "bash"], "consumed_by": ["Claude Code stop hook system"], "key_functions": ["Parses frontmatter from loop state file", "Increments iteration counter", "Emits jq-generated block JSON if closure_done != true"]}

plugins/agent-loops/skills/agent-swarm/s.summary: swarm_run.py: Job-file-driven parallel execution engine for bulk AI distillation tasks. Supports --engine [claude|gemini|copilot], --workers N, --resume (checkpoint/retry from .swarm_state_<job>.json), --dry-run, and --files-from checklist.md file discovery. For copilot engine: prepends instruction to file content as unified payload (no -p flag) to work around Copilot CLI stdin limitations; uses list-based subprocess.run with explicit env=os.environ.copy() for auth propagation; uses shell_quote(file_path) in post_cmd to safely handle filenames with apostrophes. Post-cmd lifecycle hook calls inject_summary.py after each successful completion. Race-condition safe when combined with inject_summary.py fcntl.flock.

plugins/agent-loops/skills/orchestrator/.summary: {"purpose": "Standalone CLI orchestrator for the dual-loop agent pattern: generates strategy packets for Work Packages, verifies worktree diffs against criteria, creates correction packets on failure, bundles files for red-team review, and generates retrospective templates.", "layer": "Orchestrator", "supported_object_types": ["Work Packages (WP-NN)", "Spec artifacts (spec.md, plan.md, tasks.md)", "Review bundles"], "usage": ["python agent_orchestrator.py scan --spec-dir specs/0005-foo", "python agent_orchestrator.py packet --wp WP-01 --spec-dir specs/0005-foo", "python agent_orchestrator.py verify --packet handoffs/task_packet_WP-01.md", "python agent_orchestrator.py correct --packet handoffs/task_packet_WP-01.md --feedback 'Missing tests'", "python agent_orchestrator.py bundle --files a.py b.md --output review.md", "python agent_orchestrator.py retro"], "args": ["scan: --spec-dir", "packet: --wp (required), --spec-dir (required)", "verify: --packet (required), --worktree", "correct: --packet (required), --feedback (required), --iteration", "bundle: --files, --manifest, --output (required)", "retro: --spec-dir, --output"], "inputs": ["specs/[ID]/tasks/WP-NN.md", "handoffs/task_packet_*.md", "JSON manifest for bundle"], "outputs": ["handoffs/task_packet_WP-NN.md", "handoffs/correction_packet_*.md", "review bundle .md", "retros/retro_*.md"], "dependencies": ["subprocess (git)", "json", "datetime"], "consumed_by": ["Outer Loop agent", "tools/cli.py workflow commands"], "key_functions": ["cmd_packet(): generates strategy packet from WP prompt file", "cmd_verify(): checks worktree diff vs acceptance criteria", "cmd_correct(): produces targeted correction packet", "cmd_bundle(): concatenates files into review markdown", "cmd_retro(): creates retrospective template"]}

plugins/agent-scaffolders/scripts/audit..summary: {"purpose": "Audits a plugin directory against the Agent Skills Open Standard, checking for required structure (.claude-plugin/, plugin.json, SKILL.md, references/acceptance-criteria.md) and flagging errors and warnings.", "layer": "Meta-Execution", "supported_object_types": [".claude-plugin formatted directories", "Agent Skills"], "usage": ["python3 audit.py --path <plugin-directory>"], "args": ["--path (required): absolute or relative path to the plugin directory"], "inputs": ["plugin.json", "SKILL.md files", ".mcp.json and hooks.json structures"], "outputs": ["Terminal stdout: AUDIT PASSED / AUDIT FAILED with itemised errors and warnings"], "dependencies": [], "consumed_by": ["User (CLI)", "ecosystem-standards Agent Skill"], "key_functions": ["audit_plugin(): recursively checks directory presence, plugin.json, SKILL.md line count, illegal .sh/.ps1 scripts, and acceptance-criteria.md"]}

plugins/agent-scaffolders/scripts/scaffo.summary: {"purpose": "Deterministically generates compliant directory architectures and boilerplate files for Agent Skills, Plugins, Hooks, Sub-Agents, and Commands using Jinja templates from the ../templates/ directory.", "layer": "Meta-Execution", "supported_object_types": ["Plugins", "Skills", "Hooks", "Sub-Agents", "Commands"], "usage": ["python3 scaffold.py --type skill --name my-skill --path ./plugins --desc \"My description\"", "python3 scaffold.py --type plugin --name my-plugin --path ./plugins", "python3 scaffold.py --type hook --event PreToolUse --path ./plugins/my-plugin --action command"], "args": ["--type (required): plugin|skill|hook|sub-agent|command|mcp", "--name (required): slug identifier", "--path (required): destination directory", "--desc: description for skills/agents", "--event (default PreToolUse): hook lifecycle event", "--action (default command): command|prompt|agent"], "inputs": ["../templates/*.jinja template files"], "outputs": ["Generated directory tree, SKILL.md, plugin.json, hooks.json, .mcp.json, .mmd diagram, README.md"], "dependencies": ["Jinja templates from agent-scaffolders/templates/"], "consumed_by": ["Agent Scaffolders skill (create-plugin, create-skill, etc.)"], "key_functions": ["create_plugin(): full plugin directory with manifest, README, mmd, hooks", "create_skill(): skill dir with SKILL.md, references/, acceptance-criteria.md, execute.py", "create_hook(): appends hook JSON entry to hooks.json", "create_sub_agent(): scaffolds sub-agent markdown", "create_command(): scaffolds command markdown"]}

Supports IDE, CI/CD, and both modes.", "layer": "Plugin / Agent Scaffolders", "usage": ["python scaffold_agentic_workflow.py --skill-dir <path> [--mode ide|cicd|both]"], "args": ["--skill-dir", "--plugin-dir", "--mode", "--format", "--triggers", "--kill-switch", "--stub"], "inputs": ["SKILL.md"], "outputs": [".github/agents/[name].agent.md", ".github/prompts/[name].prompt.md", ".github/workflows/[name]-agent.yml"], "dependencies": [], "key_functions": ["parse_frontmatter", "extract_workflow_steps", "generate_agent_file", "generate_prompt_file", "build_trigger_block", "generate_workflow_file", "generate_agentic_workflow"], "consumed_by": ["Developer CLI"]}

{"purpose": "Generates Azure AI Foundry Agent boilerplate from an existing Open Skill.", "layer": "Plugin / Agent Scaffolders", "usage": ["python scaffold_azure_agent.py --skill <path>"], "args": ["--skill"], "inputs": ["SKILL.md"], "outputs": ["azure_deployment/azure_agent.py", "azure_deployment/main.bicep"], "dependencies": ["azure.ai.projects", "azure.identity"], "key_functions": ["main"], "consumed_by": ["Developer CLI"]}

Supports common categories like test, build, lint, deploy.", "layer": "Plugin / Agent Scaffolders", "usage": ["python scaffold_github_action.py --category <category> [--platform ...]"], "args": ["--category", "--platform", "--triggers", "--name", "--branch"], "inputs": [], "outputs": [".github/workflows/[slug].yml"], "dependencies": [], "key_functions": ["build_on_block", "category_steps", "generate_github_action"], "consumed_by": ["Developer CLI"]}

plugins/context-bundler/scripts/bundle.p.summary: {"purpose": "Context Bundler Engine that reads a JSON manifest of file paths and concatenates their contents into a single annotated Markdown artifact suitable for LLM context ingestion or external red-team review.", "layer": "Curate / Bundler", "supported_object_types": ["JSON manifests", "Markdown, Python, JSON, TypeScript, JavaScript source files"], "usage": ["python plugins/context-bundler/scripts/bundle.py --manifest my_manifest.json --bundle output.md"], "args": ["--manifest (required): path to JSON manifest file", "--bundle (required): output path for bundled Markdown"], "inputs": ["JSON manifest with {title, description, files: [{path, note}]}"], "outputs": ["Single Markdown file with ToC, file headers, and fenced code blocks"], "dependencies": [], "consumed_by": ["manifest_manager.py bundle subcommand", "tools/cli.py manifest bundle", "context-bundling SKILL.md"], "key_functions": ["generate_bundle(): resolves manifest entries (including directory expansion), writes ToC and code-fenced file contents to output"]}

plugins/context-bundler/scripts/manifest.summary: {"purpose": "Primary CLI for the Context Bundler that handles all manifest lifecycle operations: initializing from templates, adding/removing/updating file entries, listing and searching contents, and triggering the bundle compilation step.", "layer": "Curate / Bundler", "supported_object_types": ["Generic JSON manifest files", "Base manifest templates"], "usage": ["python manifest_manager.py --manifest temp/my.json init --type generic --bundle-title \"My Bundle\"", "python manifest_manager.py --manifest temp/my.json add --path docs/example.md --note \"Reference doc\"", "python manifest_manager.py --manifest temp/my.json bundle --output temp/out.md", "python manifest_manager.py --manifest temp/my.json list", "python manifest_manager.py --manifest temp/my.json remove --path docs/example.md"], "args": ["Global: --manifest (custom path), --base (template type)", "init: --bundle-title, --type", "add: --path (required), --note", "remove: --path (required)", "update: --path, --note, --new-path", "bundle: --output"], "inputs": ["plugins/standalone/context-bundler/base-manifests/*.json (templates)", "Custom manifest JSON"], "outputs": ["Manifest JSON (on init/add/update/remove)", "temp/context-bundles/[title].md (on bundle)"], "dependencies": ["bundle.py (invoked for bundle subcommand)"], "consumed_by": ["tools/cli.py manifest commands", "context-bundling SKILL.md"], "key_functions": ["init_manifest(): bootstraps from base template", "add_file(): appends entry if not duplicate", "bundle(): delegates to bundle.py", "get_base_manifest_path(): resolves template via index or fallback", "load_manifest() / save_manifest(): JSON I/O"]}

plugins/context-bundler/scripts/path_res.summary: {"purpose": "Shared utility library providing cross-platform project root detection and path resolution, with optional loading of the Master Object Collection for legacy-system artifact lookup by object ID.", "layer": "Curate / Bundler", "supported_object_types": ["File paths", "legacy-system artifact IDs"], "usage": ["Import as library: from path_resolver import resolve_root, resolve_path"], "args": [], "inputs": ["PROJECT_ROOT env var (optional)", "legacy-system/reference-data/master_object_collection.json (optional)"], "outputs": ["Absolute path string"], "dependencies": [], "consumed_by": ["manifest_manager.py", "bundle.py", "other context-bundler scripts"], "key_functions": ["PathResolver.get_project_root(): env-var then heuristic (.agent/ landmark)", "PathResolver.to_absolute(): joins root with relative path", "PathResolver.load_master_collection(): cached load of master_object_collection.json", "PathResolver.get_object_path(): resolves artifact path from object ID and type", "resolve_root() / resolve_path(): module-level convenience wrappers"]}

plugins/env-helper/scripts/env_helper.py.summary: {"purpose": "Shared ecosystem environment variable helper for safe resolution of HF credentials and project paths.", "layer": "Plugin / Env-Helper", "usage": ["python3 env_helper.py --key HF_TOKEN", "python3 env_helper.py --all"], "args": ["--key", "--all", "--hf-config"], "inputs": [".env"], "outputs": ["Terminal stdout (value or json)"], "dependencies": [], "key_functions": ["_find_env_file", "_load_dotenv", "_get_project_root", "resolve", "resolve_hf_config"], "consumed_by": ["Developer CLI"]}

plugins/excel-to-csv/skills/excel-to-csv.summary: {"purpose": "Converts all or selected sheets and named tables from an Excel workbook (.xlsx/.xls) into individual UTF-8-BOM CSV files, intelligently detecting header rows and skipping empty sheets.", "layer": "Data Processing Utilities", "supported_object_types": [".xlsx", ".xls"], "usage": ["python3 convert.py --excel data.xlsx --sheets \"Sheet1\" --outdir ./output", "python3 convert.py --excel data.xlsx --sheets \"SalesTable\" --outdir ./output", "python3 convert.py --excel data.xlsx --outdir ./output"], "args": ["--excel / -e (required): path to Excel workbook", "--outdir / -o (default '.'): output directory", "--sheets / -s: comma-separated sheet or table names (default: all sheets)", "--write-empty: write CSV even for empty sheets"], "inputs": [".xlsx or .xls Excel workbook"], "outputs": ["<sanitized_name>.csv per extracted sheet/table in outdir"], "dependencies": ["pandas", "openpyxl"], "consumed_by": ["excel-to-csv SKILL.md", "User (CLI)"], "key_functions": ["sanitize_sheet_name(): makes filesystem-safe filename", "convert_excel_to_csv(): loads workbook, resolves sheet/table targets via openpyxl, reads with pandas, drops empty rows/cols, auto-detects header row, writes CSV"]}

plugins/huggingface-utils/scripts/hf_con.summary: {"purpose": "Single source of truth for HuggingFace credentials, repo IDs, and environment variable resolution for all HF-consuming plugins.", "layer": "Plugin / Huggingface-Utils", "usage": ["python3 hf_config.py", "from hf_config import get_hf_config"], "args": [], "inputs": [".env (HUGGING_FACE_USERNAME, HF_TOKEN, etc.)"], "outputs": ["HFConfig dataclass", "Terminal JSON output"], "dependencies": ["huggingface_hub", "dotenv"], "key_functions": ["get_discovery_tags", "_get_project_root", "get_hf_config", "validate_config"], "consumed_by": ["hf_init.py", "hf_upload.py"]}

plugins/link-checker/skills/link-checker.summary: {"purpose": "Recursively scans markdown, JSON, and .mmd files in a directory for broken relative links (excluding web URLs), reports files with missing targets, and writes a log file.", "layer": "Curate / Cli_Entry_Points", "supported_object_types": [".md", ".txt", ".json", ".markdown", ".mmd"], "usage": ["python check_broken_paths.py [target_dir]", "python check_broken_paths.py --file docs/my-doc.md"], "args": ["target_dir (positional, default CWD): directory to scan", "--file: single file to check"], "inputs": ["Documentation files in repo directories"], "outputs": ["broken_links.log (written to script dir)", "stdout summary with file:broken-link pairs"], "dependencies": [], "consumed_by": ["link-checker-agent SKILL.md", "User (CLI)"], "key_functions": ["find_files(): walks directory tree, excludes noise dirs and log files", "check_broken_links(): extracts markdown, HTML, and legacy-system ref patterns, checks existence relative to file", "main(): orchestrates scan and log write"]}

{"purpose": "Enriches markdown documentation files by auto-linking bare legacy-system object IDs (Forms, Reports, PLLs, DB objects, Roles, BRs, BWs) to their primary artifact paths using the Master Object Collection, while removing stale (Reference Missing) placeholders and normalising [[xml]]/[[xml-md]] artifact tags.", "layer": "Curate / Utilities", "supported_object_types": ["Markdown documentation files", "legacy-system Forms, Reports, PLLs, DB objects"], "usage": ["python enrich_links_v2.py --file docs/my-overview.md", "python enrich_links_v2.py --all"], "args": ["--file: specific markdown file to enrich", "--all: process all legacy-system documentation directories"], "inputs": ["legacy-system/reference-data/master_object_collection.json", "legacy-system/**/*.md"], "outputs": ["Modified .md files with embedded markdown links"], "dependencies": ["legacy-system/reference-data/master_object_collection.json"], "consumed_by": ["link-checker-agent SKILL.md", "User (CLI)"], "key_functions": ["load_master_collection(): builds case-insensitive object lookup", "enrich_content(): 5-phase enrichment pipeline (cleanup, bracket-link, artifact-tag, specific-pattern, catch-all)", "enrich_file(): skips code blocks, applies enrich_content per line", "create_link(): resolves primary artifact path from object ID and type", "is_valid_role(): filters trigger/event false positives from role detection"]}

{"purpose": "Finds and generates relative markdown links to all source file artifacts (.md overview, .xml, .pll, .fmb) for a given legacy-system identifier by walking the legacy-system directory tree.", "layer": "Curate / Utilities", "supported_object_types": ["Oracle Forms (.fmb)", "Oracle Libraries (.pll)", "XML exports", "Markdown overviews"], "usage": ["python find_source_links.py FORM0000", "python find_source_links.py EXAMPLE_LIB --doc-path docs/my-doc.md"], "args": ["identifier (positional, required): the ID to search for", "--doc-path: source document path for relative link calculation"], "inputs": ["legacy-system/ directory tree"], "outputs": ["Markdown link strings to stdout"], "dependencies": [], "consumed_by": ["link-checker-agent SKILL.md", "enrich_links_v2.py (conceptually)"], "key_functions": ["find_files(): case-insensitive walk for .md, .xml, .pll, .fmb matches", "generate_links(): builds relative markdown link strings per artifact type"]}

{"purpose": "Indexes the entire repository into a filename\u2192paths JSON map (file_inventory.json) used by smart_fix_links.py to resolve broken links.", "layer": "Curate / Cli_Entry_Points", "supported_object_types": ["All repository files"], "usage": ["python map_repository_files.py"], "args": [], "inputs": ["Current working directory (project root)"], "outputs": ["scripts/file_inventory.json: {filename: [relative_path, ...]} map"], "dependencies": [], "consumed_by": ["smart_fix_links.py"], "key_functions": ["generate_file_map(): os.walk with dir exclusions, maps each filename to all relative paths where it appears"]}

{"purpose": "Auto-corrects broken relative markdown links in .md files using fuzzy basename matching against the file_inventory.json produced by map_repository_files.py, adding (Reference Missing) placeholders for unresolvable links.", "layer": "Curate / Cli_Entry_Points", "supported_object_types": [".md files"], "usage": ["python smart_fix_links.py"], "args": [], "inputs": ["scripts/file_inventory.json (from map_repository_files.py)", "All .md files in CWD recursively"], "outputs": ["In-place updated .md files with corrected relative paths"], "dependencies": ["file_inventory.json (must run map_repository_files.py first)"], "consumed_by": ["link-checker-agent SKILL.md", "User (CLI)"], "key_functions": ["load_inventory(): loads file_inventory.json", "fix_links_in_file(): regex-replaces broken [label](path) entries; uses basename lookup then case-insensitive and hyphen-stripped fallbacks; leaves ambiguous matches untouched", "calculate_relative_path(): os.path.relpath between source and target file"]}

plugins/markdown-to-msword-converter/ski.summary: {"purpose": "Converts a single Markdown file into a Word document. Supports headings, lists, tables, quotes, and resolving internal hyperlinks to relative .docx paths.", "layer": "Plugin / Markdown-to-MSWord-Converter", "usage": ["python md_to_docx.py input.md [--output output.docx]"], "args": ["input", "--output", "-o"], "inputs": [".md file"], "outputs": [".docx file"], "dependencies": ["python-docx"], "key_functions": ["strip_inline_markdown", "resolve_word_link_target", "add_hyperlink", "add_markdown_runs", "parse_table", "convert_markdown_to_docx"], "consumed_by": ["run_bulk_md_to_docx.py", "User CLI"]}

{"purpose": "Converts all Markdown files under a root folder into Word docs by calling md_to_docx.py iteratively, guided by a json config.", "layer": "Plugin / Markdown-to-MSWord-Converter", "usage": ["python run_bulk_md_to_docx.py [--config path] [--overwrite]"], "args": ["--root", "--config", "--overwrite", "--dry-run", "--exclude", "--python-exe"], "inputs": ["folders_to_convert.json", ".md files"], "outputs": [".docx files", "Terminal build summary"], "dependencies": ["md_to_docx.py"], "key_functions": ["should_skip", "load_folder_config", "find_markdown_files_from_config", "main"], "consumed_by": ["User CLI"]}

plugins/mermaid-to-png/skills/convert-me.summary: {"purpose": "Converts a Mermaid (.mmd/.mermaid) diagram file to a PNG image using the @mermaid-js/mermaid-cli (mmdc) via npx, with configurable scale factor and theme.", "layer": "Tools & Generation", "supported_object_types": ["Mermaid standard (.mmd)", "PNG binary export"], "usage": ["python3 convert.py -i input.mmd -o output.png -s 2 -t dark"], "args": ["-i/--input (required): input .mmd file", "-o/--output (required): output .png file", "-s/--scale (default 1): resolution scale factor", "-t/--theme (default 'default'): default|forest|dark|neutral"], "inputs": [".mmd file with Mermaid diagram syntax"], "outputs": [".png image file"], "dependencies": ["npx", "@mermaid-js/mermaid-cli (auto-installed via npx -y)"], "consumed_by": ["User (CLI)", "convert-mermaid Agent Skill"], "key_functions": ["convert_mermaid(): writes temporary puppeteer-config.json (--no-sandbox), runs mmdc via subprocess, removes config on completion"]}

plugins/migration-utils/skills/migration.summary: {"purpose": "Scan the codebase for remaining references to old tool paths that should have been migrated, using the migration inventory map.", "layer": "Plugin / Migration-Utils", "usage": ["python3 audit_stale_refs.py [--fix] [--json]"], "args": ["--inventory", "--fix", "--json", "--root"], "inputs": ["migration_inventory.json", "Codebase files"], "outputs": ["Terminal audit report", "Modified files (if --fix)"], "dependencies": [], "key_functions": ["load_inventory", "build_search_terms", "scan_file", "scan_codebase", "fix_references", "print_report"], "consumed_by": ["Developer CLI"]}

{"purpose": "Selectively delete old tool files that have been successfully mapped to new plugin locations using the migration inventory.", "layer": "Plugin / Migration-Utils", "usage": ["python3 cleanup_mapped_files.py [--execute]"], "args": ["--execute"], "inputs": ["migration_inventory.json"], "outputs": ["Terminal cleanup report", "File deletions"], "dependencies": [], "key_functions": ["cleanup"], "consumed_by": ["Developer CLI"]}

{"purpose": "Scans the codebase and RLM cache to identify references to old tools paths and map them to their new plugins destinations.", "layer": "Plugin / Migration-Utils", "usage": ["python3 generate_inventory.py"], "args": [], "inputs": ["Codebase files", "rlm_tool_cache.json"], "outputs": ["migration_inventory.json", "Terminal stdout"], "dependencies": ["query_cache.py"], "key_functions": ["find_files", "map_workflows", "map_skills", "generate_inventory"], "consumed_by": ["Developer CLI", "migration_replace.py"]}

{"purpose": "Batch updates out-of-date tool references across the codebase by applying string replacements defined in the migration inventory.", "layer": "Plugin / Migration-Utils", "usage": ["python3 migration_replace.py"], "args": [], "inputs": ["migration_inventory.json", "Codebase files"], "outputs": ["Modified codebase files", "Terminal update report"], "dependencies": [], "key_functions": ["scan_and_replace"], "consumed_by": ["Developer CLI"]}

plugins/obsidian-integration/obsidian-pa.summary: {"purpose": "Core parser for Obsidian-flavored Markdown syntax. Extracts wikilinks, embeds, and generates callouts.", "layer": "Plugin / Obsidian-Integration", "usage": ["python3 parser.py analyze --file <path>", "python3 parser.py callout --type <type> --title <title> --text <text>"], "args": ["analyze (--file)", "callout (--type, --title, --text)"], "inputs": [".md files", "CLI strings"], "outputs": ["JSON analysis metrics", "Markdown callout string"], "dependencies": [], "key_functions": ["ObsidianParser.extract_links", "ObsidianParser.extract_embeds", "ObsidianParser.create_callout"], "consumed_by": ["Developer CLI", "vault_ops.py", "graph_ops.py"]}

plugins/obsidian-integration/skills/obsi.summary: {"purpose": "Read and manipulate Obsidian Bases (.base) files (YAML databases). Handles row appending, cell updates, and view config preservation.", "layer": "Plugin / Obsidian-Integration", "usage": ["python3 bases_ops.py read|append-row|update-cell --file <path> ..."], "args": ["read", "append-row", "update-cell", "--file", "--data", "--row-index", "--column", "--value"], "inputs": [".base files (YAML)"], "outputs": ["JSON result metrics", "Modified .base files"], "dependencies": ["ruamel.yaml"], "key_functions": ["read_base", "append_row", "update_cell"], "consumed_by": ["Developer CLI"]}

{"purpose": "Programmatically create and manipulate Obsidian Canvas (.canvas) files using JSON Canvas Spec 1.0, enabling generation of visual flowcharts.", "layer": "Plugin / Obsidian-Integration", "usage": ["python3 canvas_ops.py read|create|add-node|add-edge --file <path> ..."], "args": ["read", "create", "add-node", "add-edge", "--file", "--type", "--from-node", "--to-node"], "inputs": [".canvas files (JSON)"], "outputs": ["JSON result metrics", "Modified .canvas files"], "dependencies": [], "key_functions": ["_validate_node", "_validate_edge", "read_canvas", "create_canvas", "add_node", "add_edge"], "consumed_by": ["Developer CLI"]}

{"purpose": "Builds an in-memory graph index from wikilinks found across vault .md files. Provides forward-link, backlink, and N-degree connection queries.", "layer": "Plugin / Obsidian-Integration", "usage": ["python3 graph_ops.py build|forward|backlinks|connections|orphans ..."], "args": ["build", "forward", "backlinks", "connections", "orphans", "--vault-root", "--note", "--depth"], "inputs": [".md files in Vault", ".graph-index.json"], "outputs": [".graph-index.json cache", "JSON connection metrics"], "dependencies": [], "key_functions": ["VaultGraph.build", "VaultGraph.get_forward_links", "VaultGraph.get_backlinks", "VaultGraph.get_connections", "VaultGraph.find_orphans"], "consumed_by": ["Developer CLI"]}

{"purpose": "Bootstrap any project directory as an Obsidian Vault by creating .obsidian/app.json with sensible exclusion filters and updating .gitignore.", "layer": "Plugin / Obsidian-Integration", "usage": ["python3 init_vault.py --vault-root <path> [--exclude <pattern>] [--validate-only]"], "args": ["--vault-root", "--exclude", "--validate-only"], "inputs": ["Target directory", "existing app.json (if any)", ".gitignore"], "outputs": [".obsidian/app.json", ".gitignore", "JSON status report"], "dependencies": [], "key_functions": ["count_markdown_files", "init_vault"], "consumed_by": ["Developer CLI"]}

{"purpose": "Safe Create/Read/Update/Append operations for Obsidian Vault notes. Implements atomic writes, advisory locking, concurrent edit detection via mtime, and lossless YAML frontmatter.", "layer": "Plugin / Obsidian-Integration", "usage": ["python3 vault_ops.py read|create|update|append --file <path> ..."], "args": ["read", "create", "update", "append", "--file", "--content", "--frontmatter"], "inputs": [".md files", "CLI strings"], "outputs": ["Modified .md files (atomic)", "JSON status metrics"], "dependencies": ["ruamel.yaml"], "key_functions": ["AgentLock", "capture_mtime", "check_mtime_unchanged", "atomic_write", "split_frontmatter", "parse_frontmatter", "render_frontmatter", "read_note", "create_note", "update_note", "append_to_note"], "consumed_by": ["Developer CLI", "Agent AI integrations"]}

plugins/plugin-manager/scripts/audit_str.summary: {"purpose": "Fast filesystem sanity-check that verifies every plugin in plugins/ follows the standard structure (skills/<skill>/SKILL.md present, no non-exempt top-level scripts/ directories), reporting errors and warnings per plugin.", "layer": "Plugin Manager / Structure Validation", "supported_object_types": ["Plugin directories in plugins/"], "usage": ["python3 plugins/plugin-manager/scripts/audit_structure.py"], "args": [], "inputs": ["plugins/ directory tree"], "outputs": ["stdout: per-plugin error/warning report; exit code 1 if critical errors found"], "dependencies": [], "consumed_by": ["plugin-maintenance SKILL.md", "User (CLI)"], "key_functions": ["audit_plugin(): checks skills/, SKILL.md presence, loose .py files, deprecated top-level scripts/", "main(): iterates plugins/ and aggregates results"]}

plugins/plugin-manager/scripts/bulk_repl.summary: {"purpose": "Bulk installer that reads all (or glob-filtered) plugins from this repo and calls install_plugin() for each to copy or symlink them into a target project's plugins directory.", "layer": "Plugin Manager / Replication", "supported_object_types": ["Plugin directories"], "usage": ["python bulk_replicator.py --target ../my-project", "python bulk_replicator.py --target ../my-project --link --filter 'rlm-*'"], "args": ["--target (required): target project root", "--link: use symlinks instead of copy", "--filter (default '*'): glob pattern for plugin names"], "inputs": ["plugins/ directory in repo root"], "outputs": ["Installed/linked plugin directories in target project"], "dependencies": ["plugin_replicator.install_plugin() (local import)"], "consumed_by": ["plugin-bootstrap SKILL.md", "User (CLI)"], "key_functions": ["main(): iterates and installs matched plugins via plugin_replicator.install_plugin()"]}

plugins/plugin-manager/scripts/clean_orp.summary: {"purpose": "Scans agent directories (.agent, .github, .gemini, .claude) for plugin artifact directories and files belonging to plugins that no longer exist in plugins/, removing them to prevent stale artifacts.", "layer": "Plugin Manager / Cleanup", "supported_object_types": ["Agent workflow, skill, rule directories and files"], "usage": ["python3 plugins/plugin-manager/scripts/clean_orphans.py", "python3 plugins/plugin-manager/scripts/clean_orphans.py --dry-run"], "args": ["--dry-run: print what would be deleted without deleting"], "inputs": ["plugins/ (active plugin list)", ".agent/, .github/, .gemini/, .claude/ directories"], "outputs": ["Deleted orphaned directories and files from agent environments"], "dependencies": [], "consumed_by": ["/plugin-bridge_cleanup workflow", "User (CLI)"], "key_functions": ["get_active_plugins(): reads plugin names from plugins/ and plugin.json manifests", "clean_directory(): removes dirs not in active_plugins set; removes files whose prefix does not match any active plugin"]}

plugins/plugin-manager/scripts/cleanup_t.summary: {"purpose": "Utility script that nukes all subdirectories within .claude/commands, .gemini/commands, and .github/prompts to reset those agent directories to a clean state before re-installation.", "layer": "Plugin Manager / Cleanup", "supported_object_types": [".claude/commands", ".gemini/commands", ".github/prompts"], "usage": ["python cleanup_targets.py"], "args": [], "inputs": [".claude/commands, .gemini/commands, .github/prompts directories"], "outputs": ["All subdirectories within those targets are deleted"], "dependencies": ["shutil"], "consumed_by": ["plugin-bridge_cleanup workflow (pre-install cleanup step)"], "key_functions": ["clean_dir(): removes all child directories in a target path if it exists"]}

plugins/plugin-manager/scripts/generate_.summary: {"purpose": "Generates a standardized README.md for any plugin directory that is missing one, extracting the description from plugin.json, SKILL.md frontmatter, or README.md as fallback sources.", "layer": "Plugin Manager / Documentation", "supported_object_types": ["Plugin directories in plugins/"], "usage": ["python3 plugins/plugin-manager/scripts/generate_readmes.py", "python3 plugins/plugin-manager/scripts/generate_readmes.py --apply"], "args": ["--apply: write README files (default is dry-run preview)"], "inputs": ["plugins/<plugin>/.claude-plugin/plugin.json", "plugins/<plugin>/skills/*/SKILL.md"], "outputs": ["plugins/<plugin>/README.md (when --apply used)"], "dependencies": [], "consumed_by": ["plugin-maintenance SKILL.md", "User (CLI)"], "key_functions": ["get_plugin_description(): reads plugin.json \u2192 SKILL.md frontmatter \u2192 README first-line", "generate_readme(): writes standardised README.md template"]}

plugins/plugin-manager/scripts/plugin_bo.summary: {"purpose": "Automates the full plugin ecosystem synchronization: clones/pulls the vendor source repository, runs update_from_vendor.py to refresh local plugins, and runs sync_with_inventory.py to update all agent configurations.", "layer": "Plugin Manager / Bootstrap", "supported_object_types": ["Plugin vendor repository", "Local plugins/", "Agent environments"], "usage": ["python3 plugins/plugin-manager/scripts/plugin_bootstrap.py", "python3 plugins/plugin-manager/scripts/plugin_bootstrap.py --repo <url> --target antigravity"], "args": ["--repo (default: GitHub URL): vendor git repository", "--vendor-dir (default: .vendor/agent-plugins-skills): local vendor path", "--target (default: auto): agent sync target"], "inputs": ["Remote vendor git repo", "plugins/ directory"], "outputs": ["Updated local plugins", "Synced agent environment artifacts"], "dependencies": ["update_from_vendor.py", "sync_with_inventory.py"], "consumed_by": ["plugin-bootstrap SKILL.md", "/plugin-bridge_update workflow"], "key_functions": ["ensure_vendor_source(): git clone or pull", "update_local_plugins(): runs update_from_vendor.py", "sync_agent_configs(): runs sync_with_inventory.py with --target"]}

plugins/plugin-manager/scripts/plugin_in.summary: {"purpose": "Scans a plugins/ directory and generates a JSON inventory of all available plugins, extracting name, description, version and path from plugin.json, SKILL.md frontmatter, or README.md.", "layer": "Plugin Manager / Inventory", "supported_object_types": ["Plugin directories in plugins/"], "usage": ["python3 plugin_inventory.py", "python3 plugin_inventory.py --root . --output plugins-inventory.json"], "args": ["--root (default '.'): project root with plugins/ subdirectory", "--output: save JSON to file (default: print to stdout)"], "inputs": ["plugins/ directory tree"], "outputs": ["JSON array of {name, description, path, version?} per plugin"], "dependencies": ["yaml (PyYAML, used in parse_frontmatter)"], "consumed_by": ["sync_with_inventory.py (imports scan_plugins)", "User (CLI)"], "key_functions": ["extract_metadata(): prioritised extraction from plugin.json \u2192 SKILL.md \u2192 README.md", "scan_plugins(): iterates plugins/ and builds inventory list"]}

plugins/plugin-manager/scripts/plugin_re.summary: {"purpose": "Replicates (copies or symlinks) a single named plugin from this repo's plugins/ into a target project's .agent/plugins/ directory, cleaning any existing installation first.", "layer": "Plugin Manager / Replication", "supported_object_types": ["Plugin directories"], "usage": ["python plugin_replicator.py --plugin rlm-factory --target ../my-project", "python plugin_replicator.py --plugin rlm-factory --target ../my-project --link"], "args": ["--plugin (required): plugin directory name", "--target (required): target project root", "--link: create symlink instead of copy"], "inputs": ["plugins/<name>/ in this repo"], "outputs": ["<target>/.agent/plugins/<name>/ (copied or symlinked)"], "dependencies": ["shutil"], "consumed_by": ["bulk_replicator.py (imports install_plugin)", "plugin-replicator SKILL.md", "User (CLI)"], "key_functions": ["install_plugin(): locates source, resolves target, cleans existing, copies or symlinks"]}

plugins/plugin-manager/scripts/sync_with.summary: {"purpose": "Dual-inventory sync that compares vendor (source) and local plugins/ to identify deleted plugins, removes their agent artifacts via clean_plugin_artifacts(), then re-installs all local plugins via bridge_installer.py.", "layer": "Plugin Manager / Sync", "supported_object_types": ["Agent environments (.agent, .github, .gemini, .claude)", "Local and vendor plugin sets"], "usage": ["python3 sync_with_inventory.py", "python3 sync_with_inventory.py --dry-run", "python3 sync_with_inventory.py --cleanup-only"], "args": ["--dry-run: simulate cleanup without deleting", "--cleanup-only: skip installation step"], "inputs": [".vendor/agent-plugins-skills/vendor-plugins-inventory.json or .vendor/*/plugins/", "plugins/ (local)"], "outputs": ["local-plugins-inventory.json", "Cleaned and updated agent environment directories"], "dependencies": ["plugin_inventory.py (imports scan_plugins)", "bridge_installer.py (plugin-mapper canonical)"], "consumed_by": ["plugin_bootstrap.py", "/plugin-bridge_update workflow", "inventory-sync SKILL.md"], "key_functions": ["get_inventory_names(): delegates to plugin_inventory.scan_plugins()", "clean_plugin_artifacts(): removes dirs and prefixed files for a plugin from all agent dirs", "run_bridge_installer(): delegates per-plugin installation to bridge_installer.py"]}

plugins/plugin-manager/scripts/update_ag.summary: {"purpose": "Master sync orchestrator that runs the full agent system update in 4 sequential steps: Kernel Sync (rules), Core Workflow Sync, Plugin Installation, and Skill Distribution.", "layer": "Plugin Manager / Orchestration", "supported_object_types": ["Full agent ecosystem"], "usage": ["python3 plugins/plugin-manager/scripts/update_agent_system.py"], "args": [], "inputs": ["speckit_system_bridge.py", "sync_workflows.py", "install_all_plugins.py", "sync_skills.py"], "outputs": ["Updated CLAUDE.md/rules, installed workflows, skills distributed to .claude/.github/.gemini"], "dependencies": ["spec-kitty-plugin scripts (speckit_system_bridge.py, sync_workflows.py, sync_skills.py)", "plugin-mapper/install_all_plugins.py"], "consumed_by": ["/plugin-bridge_update workflow", "User (CLI)"], "key_functions": ["run_step(): executes a named script via subprocess with fail-fast on non-zero exit", "main(): sequentially runs Kernel \u2192 Core \u2192 Plugins \u2192 Skills steps"]}

plugins/plugin-mapper/skills/agent-bridg.summary: {"purpose": "Installs Agent Plugins (.claude-plugin structure) into target IDE environments (antigravity/.agent, claude/.claude, gemini/.gemini, github/.github) by parsing plugin.json manifests and copying formatted skills, rules, workflows, and command files into the correct target subdirectories.", "layer": "System Integration Layer", "supported_object_types": [".claude-plugin directory structures", "Markdown commands, skills, agents", ".mcp.json and hooks.json manifests"], "usage": ["python3 bridge_installer.py --plugin plugins/rlm-factory --target auto", "python3 bridge_installer.py --plugin plugins/rlm-factory --target antigravity"], "args": ["--plugin (required): path to plugin folder", "--target (default 'auto'): auto|antigravity|github|gemini|claude"], "inputs": ["plugins/<name>/.claude-plugin/plugin.json", "plugins/<name>/skills/*/SKILL.md", "plugins/<name>/commands/*.md", "plugins/<name>/rules/**"], "outputs": [".agent/skills/, .agent/workflows/, .agent/rules/ (and equivalents for other targets)"], "dependencies": [], "consumed_by": ["install_all_plugins.py", "sync_with_inventory.py", "agent-bridge SKILL.md"], "key_functions": ["parse_frontmatter(): extracts YAML from .md files", "command_output_stem(): builds flattened namespaced filename", "install_antigravity() / install_claude() / install_gemini() / install_github(): per-target mapping strategies"]}

{"purpose": "Bulk installer that iterates every directory in plugins/ and invokes bridge_installer.py for each one to batch-deploy all plugins to the specified agent target environment.", "layer": "System Integration", "supported_object_types": ["All plugin directories under plugins/"], "usage": ["python3 install_all_plugins.py --target auto", "python3 install_all_plugins.py --target antigravity"], "args": ["--target (default 'auto'): target environment (auto, antigravity, claude, cursor, roo, OpenHands, etc.)"], "inputs": ["plugins/ directory (all subdirectories)"], "outputs": ["Installed skills/workflows/rules per plugin into target agent directories"], "dependencies": ["bridge_installer.py (sibling script)"], "consumed_by": ["update_agent_system.py", "/plugin-bridge_install workflow", "agent-bridge SKILL.md"], "key_functions": ["main(): iterates plugins/ sorted, calls bridge_installer.py as subprocess for each plugin, reports success/fail count"]}

plugins/protocol-manager/skills/protocol.summary: {"purpose": "Create, list, search, update, and view Protocol documents (governance records). Handles sequential numbering, standardized templates, and metadata parsing.", "layer": "Plugin / Protocol-Manager", "usage": ["python3 protocol_manager.py create|list|get|search|update ..."], "args": ["create", "list", "get", "search", "update", "--content", "--status", "--classification", "--version", "--authority", "--linked", "--limit"], "inputs": ["CLI arguments", "01_PROTOCOLS directory files"], "outputs": ["Generated markdown files", "Terminal stdout"], "dependencies": [], "key_functions": ["_get_next_number", "_parse_protocol", "create_protocol", "list_protocols", "get_protocol", "search_protocols", "update_protocol"], "consumed_by": ["Developer CLI", "Protocol Agent"]}

plugins/rlm-factory/skills/rlm-curator/s.summary: {"purpose": "RLM Cleanup: Prunes stale (source file missing), failed ([DISTILLATION FAILED] sentinel), and orphan (not in manifest) entries from the RLM semantic ledger cache JSON with dry-run safety by default.", "layer": "Curate / Rlm", "supported_object_types": ["rlm_summary_cache.json", "rlm_tool_cache.json"], "usage": ["python plugins/rlm-factory/skills/rlm-curator/scripts/cleanup_cache.py --profile plugins", "python plugins/rlm-factory/skills/rlm-curator/scripts/cleanup_cache.py --profile tools --prune-orphans --prune-failed --apply"], "args": ["--profile (required): RLM profile name from rlm_profiles.json", "--apply: commit removals (default dry-run)", "--prune-orphans: also remove entries not covered by manifest", "--prune-failed: remove entries with [DISTILLATION FAILED]", "--v: verbose per-entry logging"], "inputs": ["rlm_profiles.json profile config", "cache JSON file (determined by profile)"], "outputs": ["Modified cache JSON (when --apply)", "stdout removal report"], "dependencies": ["rlm_config.RLMConfig, load_cache, save_cache, collect_files"], "consumed_by": ["/rlm-factory_cleanup workflow", "rlm-curator SKILL.md"], "key_functions": ["run_cleanup(): entry-by-entry sweep with three removal criteria (stale/failed/orphan); writes cache via save_cache() when --apply", "remove_entry(): programmatic single-entry removal API for other scripts to call"]}

{"purpose": "Non-destructive diagnostic utility that prints a detailed state summary for all known RLM profiles: resolves config, checks manifest existence, counts discoverable files, and reports model configuration without writing anything to disk.", "layer": "Curate / Rlm", "supported_object_types": ["RLM profiles"], "usage": ["python plugins/rlm-factory/skills/rlm-curator/scripts/debug_rlm.py"], "args": [], "inputs": [".agent/learning/rlm_profiles.json"], "outputs": ["stdout: per-profile state summary (manifest exists, cache path, file count, model, sample file)"], "dependencies": ["rlm_config.RLMConfig, collect_files"], "consumed_by": ["Developer debugging", "rlm-curator SKILL.md"], "key_functions": ["inspect_profile(): loads RLMConfig, checks manifest existence, calls collect_files() and prints summary"]}

{"purpose": "RLM Engine: Recursively summarizes repository files using a local Ollama LLM. Reads a named profile from rlm_profiles.json to determine which files to distill, generates semantic summaries with a prompt template, and writes results incrementally to the cache JSON (crash-resilient, hash-deduplicated). Supports single-file, recent-change-only, forced full, and dry-run injection modes.", "layer": "Curate / Rlm", "supported_object_types": ["rlm_summary_cache.json", "rlm_tool_cache.json"], "usage": ["python plugins/rlm-factory/skills/rlm-curator/scripts/distiller.py --profile plugins", "python plugins/rlm-factory/skills/rlm-curator/scripts/distiller.py --profile tools --file path/to/file.py --force", "python plugins/rlm-factory/skills/rlm-curator/scripts/distiller.py --profile plugins --since 24", "python plugins/rlm-factory/skills/rlm-curator/scripts/distiller.py --profile tools --summary '{...json...}'"], "args": ["--profile (required): RLM profile from rlm_profiles.json", "--file / -f: single file to process", "--force: ignore cache hit and re-distill", "--cleanup: remove stale entries before distilling", "--since HOURS: only process files changed in last N hours", "--summary: inject pre-generated summary string (skips Ollama)", "--debug: enable verbose logging"], "inputs": [".agent/learning/rlm_profiles.json", "source files collected from manifest patterns"], "outputs": ["Cache JSON updated incrementally after each successful distillation"], "dependencies": ["requests (Ollama HTTP API)", "rlm_config.RLMConfig, compute_hash, load_cache, save_cache, should_skip, collect_files"], "consumed_by": ["/rlm-factory_distill workflow", "rlm-curator SKILL.md", "manage_tool_inventory.py (--summary injection path)"], "key_functions": ["call_ollama(): sends content+prompt to Ollama HTTP API, truncates at 12k chars, strips preamble artifacts", "distill(): incremental loop over file list \u2014 hash-checks existing cache, calls Ollama, persists after every write", "run_cleanup(): removes stale entries whose source files are gone"]}

{"purpose": "Direct JSON injection script for Agent-Driven Distillation. Allows an AI Agent to write a summary directly into the RLM cache, bypassing local Ollama.", "layer": "Plugin / Rlm-Factory", "usage": ["python inject_summary.py --profile <name> --file <path> --summary <string/json>"], "args": ["--profile", "--file", "--summary"], "inputs": ["Target file path", "Summary payload string", "rlm_profiles.json", "Existing rlm_cache json"], "outputs": ["Updated RLM cache JSON file", "Terminal stdout"], "dependencies": ["rlm_config.py"], "key_functions": ["load_cache", "compute_hash", "save_cache", "main"], "consumed_by": ["AI Agents (e.g. gap-fill script)"]}

{"purpose": "RLM Auditor: Compares the semantic cache against the live filesystem to produce a coverage report. Identifies files on disk not yet in cache (missing) and cache entries whose source files have been deleted (stale).", "layer": "Curate / Rlm", "supported_object_types": ["rlm_summary_cache.json", "rlm_tool_cache.json"], "usage": ["python plugins/rlm-factory/skills/rlm-curator/scripts/inventory.py --profile plugins", "python plugins/rlm-factory/skills/rlm-curator/scripts/inventory.py --profile tools"], "args": ["--profile (required): RLM profile name from rlm_profiles.json"], "inputs": ["rlm_profiles.json profile config", "cache JSON file", "live filesystem via collect_files()"], "outputs": ["stdout: coverage stats (disk count, cache count, coverage %, missing list, stale list)"], "dependencies": ["rlm_config.RLMConfig, load_cache, collect_files"], "consumed_by": ["/rlm-factory_audit workflow", "rlm-curator SKILL.md"], "key_functions": ["audit_inventory(): set-diff between filesystem paths and cache keys, prints coverage statistics"]}

{"purpose": "RLM Search: Instant keyword-based lookup against the semantic ledger. Searches both entry paths and summary text to surface relevant cached records.", "layer": "Curate / Rlm", "supported_object_types": ["rlm_summary_cache.json", "rlm_tool_cache.json"], "usage": ["python plugins/rlm-factory/skills/rlm-curator/scripts/query_cache.py --profile plugins \"rlm\"", "python plugins/rlm-factory/skills/rlm-curator/scripts/query_cache.py --profile tools --list", "python plugins/rlm-factory/skills/rlm-curator/scripts/query_cache.py --profile plugins \"factory\" --json"], "args": ["term (positional, optional): search keyword", "--profile (required): RLM profile name", "--list: enumerate all paths instead of searching", "--no-summary: hide summary preview", "--json: output as JSON array"], "inputs": ["cache JSON file determined by profile"], "outputs": ["stdout: formatted match results with path, indexed timestamp, summary preview; or JSON"], "dependencies": ["rlm_config.RLMConfig, load_cache"], "consumed_by": ["/rlm-factory_query workflow", "rlm-curator SKILL.md", "manage_tool_inventory.py"], "key_functions": ["search_cache(): case-insensitive keyword match on paths + summaries, sorted output", "list_cache(): prints all cache keys in sorted order"]}

{"purpose": "Centralized configuration and shared utility library for the entire RLM Toolchain. Loads profile settings from .agent/learning/rlm_profiles.json and provides RLMConfig dataclass plus shared helpers (compute_hash, load_cache, save_cache, should_skip, collect_files).", "layer": "Curate / Rlm", "supported_object_types": ["rlm_profiles.json entries", "All files covered by RLM manifests"], "usage": ["from rlm_config import RLMConfig, load_cache, save_cache, collect_files"], "args": ["RLMConfig(profile_name='plugins'): construct from profile name", "RLMConfig.from_profile('tools'): factory class method"], "inputs": [".agent/learning/rlm_profiles.json", "Manifest JSON files referenced in profiles"], "outputs": ["Configured RLMConfig instance giving access to cache_path, manifest_path, prompt_template, include_patterns, allowed_suffixes, llm_model"], "dependencies": [], "consumed_by": ["distiller.py", "query_cache.py", "cleanup_cache.py", "inventory.py", "debug_rlm.py"], "key_functions": ["RLMConfig.__init__(): loads profile JSON, resolves all paths, loads manifest include patterns and prompt template", "compute_hash(): first 16 chars of SHA256 for cache freshness check", "load_cache() / save_cache(): crash-resilient JSON I/O", "should_skip(): extension allowlist + substring exclude filter", "collect_files(): glob pattern and directory expansion with deduplication"]}

plugins/sanctuary-guardian/scripts/captu.summary: {"purpose": "Generates a consolidated snapshot of the project state (Protocol 128 v3.5) by validating manifest bounds against Git state and calling the context-bundler.", "layer": "Plugin / Sanctuary-Guardian", "usage": ["python3 capture_snapshot.py [--type audit|learning_audit|seal] [--context \"strategic string\"]"], "args": ["--type", "--context"], "inputs": ["Git repository status", "Manifest JSON files", "Codebase"], "outputs": ["Markdown Context Packet", "Terminal JSON stdout"], "dependencies": ["context-bundler/bundle.py", "rlm-factory/cortex_synthesis.py"], "key_functions": ["get_git_state", "main"], "consumed_by": ["Session Closure CLI", "Guardian Agent"]}

plugins/sanctuary-guardian/scripts/evolu.summary: {"purpose": "Computes proxy fitness metrics (Depth, Scope) for the Map-Elites archive based on citation density, length, and linked domains.", "layer": "Plugin / Sanctuary-Guardian", "usage": ["python3 evolution_metrics.py fitness|depth|scope --file path/to.md"], "args": ["fitness", "depth", "scope", "--file"], "inputs": [".md file or raw text"], "outputs": ["JSON result specifying depth, scope, or both"], "dependencies": [], "key_functions": ["measure_depth", "measure_scope", "calculate_fitness"], "consumed_by": ["Evolutionary/Learning Agents"]}

plugins/sanctuary-guardian/scripts/forge.summary: {"purpose": "CLI interface for querying the fine-tuned Sanctuary locally-hosted model via Ollama.", "layer": "Plugin / Sanctuary-Guardian", "usage": ["python3 forge_llm.py query \"prompt\" | status"], "args": ["query", "status", "--temperature", "--max-tokens", "--system"], "inputs": ["Prompt string", "Ollama API server"], "outputs": ["JSON model responses and token metrics"], "dependencies": ["ollama"], "key_functions": ["query_model", "check_status"], "consumed_by": ["Agents seeking inferences"]}

plugins/sanctuary-guardian/scripts/guard.summary: {"purpose": "Generates the Guardian boot digest (Protocol 114) for session initialization, reading container health, priorities, and manifest context.", "layer": "Plugin / Sanctuary-Guardian", "usage": ["python3 guardian_wakeup.py [--mode HOLISTIC]"], "args": ["--mode"], "inputs": ["Docker container status", "Tasks directory", ".agent/learning/guardian_manifest.json"], "outputs": [".agent/learning/guardian_boot_digest.md", "Terminal JSON"], "dependencies": [], "key_functions": ["get_system_health_traffic_light", "get_container_status", "get_tactical_priorities", "main"], "consumed_by": ["Session Bootloader"]}

plugins/sanctuary-guardian/scripts/learn.summary: {"purpose": "Scans the project for recent technical state changes (Protocol 128 Phase I) using Git diff and file modification times.", "layer": "Plugin / Sanctuary-Guardian", "usage": ["python3 learning_debrief.py [--hours 24] [--output file.md]"], "args": ["--hours", "--output"], "inputs": ["Git logs", "Filesystem mtimes", "Protocol docs", "Learning Snapshot"], "outputs": ["Formatted Debrief MD String", "Terminal JSON"], "dependencies": [], "key_functions": ["get_git_diff_summary", "get_recency_delta", "generate_debrief"], "consumed_by": ["Session Bootloader"]}

plugins/sanctuary-guardian/scripts/persi.summary: {"purpose": "Broadcasts the session sealed memory and RLM caches to the Hugging Face AI Commons. Thin wrapper delegating to huggingface-utils plugin.", "layer": "Plugin / Sanctuary-Guardian", "usage": ["python3 persist_soul.py [--snapshot path] [--valence float] [--full-sync]"], "args": ["--snapshot", "--valence", "--full-sync"], "inputs": ["snapshot markdown packet", "RLM summary cache"], "outputs": ["Uploads to HuggingFace Database", "Terminal JSON"], "dependencies": ["huggingface-utils plugin"], "key_functions": ["main", "_resolve_hf_plugin"], "consumed_by": ["Session Closure Protocol"]}

plugins/sanctuary-guardian/skills/forge-.summary: {"purpose": "Exports sealed Obsidian vault notes into soul_traces.jsonl for HuggingFace persistence. Implements snapshot isolation, git pre-flight checks, and JSONL formatting (ADR 081).", "layer": "Plugin / Sanctuary-Guardian", "usage": ["python3 forge_soul.py --vault-root <path> [--full-sync] [--dry-run]"], "args": ["--vault-root", "--full-sync", "--dry-run", "--output"], "inputs": ["Vault .md files with status: sealed frontmatter", "Git tree status"], "outputs": ["soul_traces.jsonl", "HuggingFace uploads"], "dependencies": ["ruamel.yaml", "huggingface-utils"], "key_functions": ["git_preflight", "extract_frontmatter", "find_sealed_notes", "capture_snapshot", "verify_snapshot", "format_record", "format_full_sync"], "consumed_by": ["Session Closure Protocol"]}

plugins/spec-kitty-plugin/skills/spec-ki.summary: {"purpose": "Synchronizes spec-kitty configuration files across repositories.", "layer": "Curate / Sync", "usage": "python plugins/spec-kitty-plugin/skills/spec-kitty-agent/scripts/sync_configuration.py --target /path/to/repo", "args": {"--target": "Path to target repository", "--force": "Skip confirmation"}, "inputs": ["spec-kitty config templates"], "outputs": ["Updated .agent/ and .kittify/ configs"], "dependencies": ["shutil", "json", "pathlib"], "consumed_by": ["spec-kitty-plugin init/update workflows"]}

{"purpose": "Verifies current workflow state and consistency of Spec-Kitty artifacts.", "layer": "Audit / Workflow", "usage": "python plugins/spec-kitty-plugin/skills/spec-kitty-agent/scripts/verify_workflow_state.py --spec specs/001/spec.md", "args": {"--spec": "Path to spec file", "--repair": "Attempt to fix minor inconsistencies"}, "inputs": ["spec.md", "plan.md", "tasks.md"], "outputs": ["Audit report", "Repaired artifacts (optional)"], "dependencies": ["pathlib", "re"], "consumed_by": ["spec-kitty-plugin review/status workflows"]}

plugins/task-manager/skills/task-agent/s.summary: {"purpose": "Lightweight Kanban Task Manager functioning via a Markdown-backed task board with lane directories (todo, in-progress, done, backlog).", "layer": "Plugin / Task-Manager", "usage": ["python3 task_manager.py create|list|get|move|search|board ..."], "args": ["create", "title", "list", "get", "move", "search", "board", "--lane", "--objective", "--acceptance", "--note", "task_number", "new_lane", "query"], "inputs": ["CLI arguments", "task markdown files (*.md)"], "outputs": ["Lane transitions", "Terminal stdout", "Markdown file generation"], "dependencies": [], "key_functions": ["cmd_create", "cmd_list", "cmd_get", "cmd_move", "cmd_search", "cmd_board"], "consumed_by": ["Spec-Kitty agent", "Human CLI users"]}

{"purpose": "Audits plugins for structure and compliance with Agent Skills standards.", "layer": "Audit / Compliance", "usage": "python plugins/tool-inventory/skills/tool-inventory/scripts/audit_plugins.py --plugin adr-manager", "args": {"--plugin": "Specific plugin to audit", "--all": "Audit all plugins"}, "inputs": ["Plugin directories", "plugin.json", "SKILL.md"], "outputs": ["Audit results", "Compliance report"], "dependencies": ["pathlib", "json"], "consumed_by": ["tool-inventory-manage workflow", "/plugin-bridge_install"]}

{"purpose": "Fixes relative paths in tool inventory JSON files after move or rename.", "layer": "Curate / Inventory", "usage": "python plugins/tool-inventory/skills/tool-inventory/scripts/fix_inventory_paths.py --inventory path/to/inventory.json", "args": {"--inventory": "Path to inventory file", "--dry-run": "Preview changes only"}, "inputs": ["inventory.json"], "outputs": ["Updated inventory.json"], "dependencies": ["json", "pathlib"], "consumed_by": ["tool-inventory-manage workflow", "/tool-inventory_tool-inventory-manage"]}

{"purpose": "Scans the plugins/ directory and generates a flat JSON manifest of all scripts.", "layer": "Curate / Discovery", "usage": "python plugins/tool-inventory/skills/tool-inventory/scripts/generate_tools_manifest.py --output plugins/tools_manifest.json", "args": {"--output": "Output path for manifest"}, "inputs": ["plugins/ directory structure"], "outputs": ["tools_manifest.json"], "dependencies": ["json", "pathlib", "ast"], "consumed_by": ["tool-inventory-manage workflow", "/tool-inventory_tool-inventory-manage"]}

{"purpose": "Master CLI for managing tool inventories (add, remove, search, list, update).", "layer": "Curate / Discovery", "usage": "python plugins/tool-inventory/skills/tool-inventory/scripts/manage_tool_inventory.py list", "args": {"--path": "Path to tool", "--category": "Tool category", "keyword": "Search keyword"}, "inputs": ["tool_inventory.json", "rlm_tool_cache.json"], "outputs": ["Updated inventory/cache", "Search results"], "dependencies": ["argparse", "pathlib", "json", "ast"], "consumed_by": ["/tool-inventory_tool-inventory-manage", "cli.py"]}

{"purpose": "Rebuilds the tool inventory JSON from scratch by scanning for scripts.", "layer": "Curate / Maintenance", "usage": "python plugins/tool-inventory/skills/tool-inventory/scripts/rebuild_inventory.py --apply", "args": {"--apply": "Save results to inventory", "--scan-all": "Scan entire project instead of just plugins/"}, "inputs": ["Filesystem"], "outputs": ["Rebuilt inventory JSON"], "dependencies": ["pathlib", "json", "datetime"], "consumed_by": ["tool-inventory-manage workflow"]}

{"purpose": "Syncs tool descriptions from script docstrings into the inventory JSON.", "layer": "Curate / Sync", "usage": "python plugins/tool-inventory/skills/tool-inventory/scripts/sync_inventory_descriptions.py --all", "args": {"--all": "Update all tools", "--path": "Update specific tool"}, "inputs": ["Filesystem", "inventory JSON"], "outputs": ["Updated inventory JSON"], "dependencies": ["ast", "pathlib", "json"], "consumed_by": ["tool-inventory-manage workflow"]}

{"purpose": "Embedded ChromaDB wrapper for tool-inventory plugin. Provides a dedicated vector store for tool discovery and semantic search over tool summaries without external dependencies.", "layer": "Plugin / Tool Inventory", "supported_object_types": ["Tool Summaries"], "usage": ["python3 plugins/tool-inventory/skills/tool-inventory/scripts/tool_chroma.py [stats|list|search|import-json]"], "args": ["stats: Show collection stats", "list: List all entries", "search <query>: Semantic search", "import-json <path>: Import from RLM cache"], "inputs": ["rlm_tool_cache.json"], "outputs": ["ChromaDB persistence directory"], "dependencies": ["chromadb"], "consumed_by": ["manage_tool_inventory.py", "Manual Discovery"], "key_functions": ["upsert", "remove", "search", "list_all", "import_from_json", "main"]}

plugins/vector-db/skills/vector-db-agent.summary: {"purpose": "Cleans up the vector database by removing stale or orphan entries.", "layer": "Maintenance / Core", "usage": "python plugins/vector-db/skills/vector-db-agent/scripts/cleanup.py --orphan-only", "args": {"--orphan-only": "Only remove files that no longer exist on disk"}, "inputs": ["Vector DB", "Filesystem"], "outputs": ["Cleanup report", "Pruned index"], "dependencies": ["chromadb", "pathlib"], "consumed_by": ["/vector-db_cleanup"]}

{"purpose": "Core ingestion engine for the Sanctuary RAG system using ChromaDB.", "layer": "Core / RAG", "usage": "python plugins/vector-db/skills/vector-db-agent/scripts/ingest.py --incremental", "args": {"--full": "Purge and re-index all", "--incremental": "Only index modified files"}, "inputs": ["Filesystem documents (.md, .py, .js, .txt)"], "outputs": ["Updated ChromaDB collection"], "dependencies": ["chromadb", "langchain", "pathlib"], "consumed_by": ["cli.py", "/vector-db_ingest"]}

{"purpose": "Shim for ingesting code files with specialized chunking for functions/classes.", "layer": "Core / RAG", "usage": "python plugins/vector-db/skills/vector-db-agent/scripts/ingest_code_shim.py --file path/to/code.py", "args": {"--file": "Target code file"}, "inputs": ["Python/JS source files"], "outputs": ["Code-aware chunks in Vector DB"], "dependencies": ["ast", "pathlib", "chromadb"], "consumed_by": ["vector-db ingest workflow"]}

{"purpose": "Common operations for interacting with the Sanctuary vector database.", "layer": "Core / RAG", "usage": "python plugins/vector-db/skills/vector-db-agent/scripts/operations.py stats", "args": {"--collection": "Target collection name"}, "inputs": ["ChromaDB"], "outputs": ["Status/Stats objects"], "dependencies": ["chromadb", "pydantic"], "consumed_by": ["cli.py", "vector-db scripts"]}

{"purpose": "CLI for performing semantic search queries against the Sanctuary RAG index.", "layer": "Discovery / Search", "usage": "python plugins/vector-db/skills/vector-db-agent/scripts/query.py \"search query\"", "args": {"--limit": "Max results", "query": "Search text"}, "inputs": ["Vector DB"], "outputs": ["Search results JSON/text"], "dependencies": ["chromadb", "argparse"], "consumed_by": ["cli.py", "/vector-db_query"]}

{"purpose": "Configuration loader and path resolver for the vector-db plugin.", "layer": "Core / Config", "usage": "python plugins/vector-db/skills/vector-db-agent/scripts/vector_config.py", "args": {}, "inputs": ["vector_profiles.json"], "outputs": ["Config objects"], "dependencies": ["json", "pathlib"], "consumed_by": ["vector-db scripts"]}

{"purpose": "Checks the structural consistency of the Sanctuary vector database.", "layer": "Audit / RAG", "usage": "python plugins/vector-db/skills/vector-db-agent/scripts/vector_consistency_check.py", "args": {}, "inputs": ["ChromaDB metadata"], "outputs": ["Inconsistency report"], "dependencies": ["chromadb", "pathlib"], "consumed_by": ["vector-db maintenance"]}

plugins/vector-db/skills/vector-db-init/.summary: {"purpose": "Initializes the vector database environment and first collection.", "layer": "Bootstrap / Config", "usage": "python plugins/vector-db/skills/vector-db-init/scripts/init.py", "args": {}, "inputs": ["User input", "Templates"], "outputs": ["vector_profiles.json", "Init report"], "dependencies": ["pathlib", "subprocess"], "consumed_by": ["spec-kitty-init workflow"]}

tools/cli.py.summary: tools/cli.py: Project Sanctuary unified Command Line Interface. Main entry point for all core operations via subcommands: Protocol 128 learning loop (debrief, snapshot, persist-soul, guardian), RAG Cortex (ingest, query, stats, cache-warmup), Context Bundling (manifest, init-context), Tool Discovery (tools list/search/add), Workflow Orchestration (workflow start/retrospective/end), RLM Distillation (Protocol 132), Domain Entities (chronicle, task, ADR, protocol), and Fine-Tuned Forge. Legacy wrapper — most workflows now route through spec-kitty CLI and plugin scripts directly. Kept for backwards compatibility with existing agent commands referencing 'python tools/cli.py'.
